txt.en:
'Little one, you may be of help to the Eldgang. While we did not build this place, it is our home now, and it is threatened by the Ghâshfra from the surface world.

'There are many places in Nûrz Ghâshu where the Eldgang cannot go, for they are too small. Perhaps you would go into these holes and drive forth the Ghâshfra? Then we may have peace again.

'There are many Ghâshfra in Nûrz Ghâshu. They are like a plague.'
'Please destroy the violators of our home, [placeholder].'
'Many have noticed your work with killing the Fire-orcs [placeholder].'
The Ghâshfra, a breed of Fire-orcs from Angmar, have invaded the Rift of Nûrz Ghâshu.
Orcs of the Ghâshfra can be found throughout the Rift of Nûrz Ghâshu.\n\nHyrrokkin has asked you to defeat the Ghâshfra which have invaded the Rift of Nûrz Ghâshu.
